tutorial.title: Installation Tutorial
tutorial.description: Learn how to install the app on different devices and browsers
tutorial.benefitsNotificationsDesc: Get updates like a native app
tutorial.chromeStep1: Look for the install icon in the address bar or a banner at the bottom
tutorial.chromeStep3: The app will be added to your applications and home screen
tutorial.iosStep1: Open the app in Safari browser
tutorial.iosStep2: Tap the Share button at the bottom of the screen
tutorial.iosStep3: Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'
tutorial.iosStep4: Confirm by tapping 'Add' in the top right corner
tutorial.androidStep1: Open the app in Chrome or another supported browser
tutorial.androidStep2: Look for the 'Add to Home Screen' banner or check the menu
tutorial.androidStep3: Tap 'Install' or 'Add to Home Screen' to complete installation
